org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages

Class Connect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.MqttFrame
      • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.Connect

  • public class Connect
extends MqttFrame
    Connect message Class. When a TCP/IP socket connection is established from a client to a server, a protocol level session must be created using a CONNECT flow. Variable header Protocol Name byte 1 Length MSB (0) byte 2 Length LSB (6) byte 3 K byte 4 a byte 5 a byte 6 t byte 7 c byte 8 p Protocol version byte 9 Version (1) Connect Flags byte 10 User name flag (0) Password flag (0) Will RETAIN (0) Will QoS (00) Will flag (0) Clean Session (1) 0x02 - value Keep Alive timer byte 11 Keep alive MSB (0) byte 12 Keep alive LSB (200) Keep Alive timer - default value 200 seconds. Payload: Session Key: AES Session encoding key (16 byte) - encrypted with the Operations server RSA Public Key EndpointPublicKeyHash: SHA Hash of Endpoint Public Key (32 byte) Signature: RSA signature (32 byte) signed with the Endpoint Private Key of Session key (16 byte) + EndpointPublicKeyHash (32 byte)
    Author:
    Andrey Panasenko

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connect

        public Connect(int keepAlive,
               int nextProtocolId,
               byte[] aesSessionKey,
               byte[] syncRequest,
               byte[] signature)
        Default Constructor.
        Parameters:
        keepAlive - the keep alive in seconds, max value 65535 seconds.
        nextProtocolId - the next protocol id
        aesSessionKey - the byte[] of AES session key, length 16 byte.
        syncRequest - the byte[] of Avro SyncRequest object
        signature - the byte[] of Signature of aesSessionKey and endpointPublicKeyHash, length 32 byte.
